member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TYPE_DESC.Type
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies the variable type.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TYPE_DESC.Rows
member.summary: Number of rows in a matrix. Otherwise a numeric type returns 1, any other type returns 0.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TYPE_DESC.Columns
member.summary: Number of columns in a matrix. Otherwise a numeric type returns 1, any other type returns 0.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TYPE_DESC.Elements
member.summary: Number of elements in an array; otherwise 0.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TYPE_DESC.Members
member.summary: Number of members in the structure; otherwise 0.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TYPE_DESC.Offset
member.summary: Offset, in bytes, between the start of the parent structure and this variable. Can be 0 if not a structure member.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_TYPE_DESC.Name
member.summary: Name of the shader-variable type. This member can be NULL if it isn't used. This member supports dynamic shader linkage interface types, which have names. For more info about dynamic shader linkage, see Dynamic Linking.
